WorkItem.Description:
In column properties of the table AUTO_INCREMENT flag would be very helpful.
I'm trying to move from mysql_workbench to a cloud solution.
All my primary keys on the tables are set to auto_increment.
I cannot reproduce such model in a Sea Qual.

Please advice,

Alex.
WorkItem.Summary: AUTO_INCREMENT flag on column needs to be added

Comments.Message: The Identity flag is the working equivalent to MySQL's AUTO_INCREMENT.
